posts.author: Leia Organa
posts.title: I'm here 4 U
posts.content: You are all bad asses. I believe in you. LMK how I can help you shine!

comments.author: Marceline
comments.comment: Yeah, I want you to be proud. I want you to be proud of me!

posts.author: Padmé Amidala
posts.title: U R a Jedi
posts.content: You should be paid fairly, without compromise. I call it 'aggressive negotiations'.
